pages.text: The above blocks are made by means of a stone cutting mechanism, which serves as the base of the altar. A total of four were needed, placed in the center of the four sides of the 9x9 altar. In addition, 81 Blackstone blocks are required. Note: Can only be summoned in the Nether.
Used to summon blackstone golems on a pedestal, four are required.
Place gold-encrusted blackstone fragments on the base of the four edge centers to summon.
